h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Non-White (Round Two)
content: **Warning** \- Before you proceed, make sure you've defeated the Apramana Bat along the North Shore of the Bitter Lake, and also encountered the Treasure Hunter man before you proceed into the next area!

**Warning** \- Before you proceed, make sure you've defeated the Apramana Bat along the North Shore of the Bitter Lake, and also encountered the Treasure Hunter man before you proceed into the next area!
